# XCLV

> XCLV is an investment company founded by Viktor Konovalov that invests in visionary geniuses when nobody else will. Based in Warsaw, Poland.

Viktor Konovalov is an AI Branding Expert & Creative Director with over 25 years of international experience. He completed the Stanford University & DeepLearning.AI Machine Learning Specialization in 2024. Through XCLV, he identifies and backs extraordinary founders and builders at the earliest stages â€” before consensus forms around their potential.
